revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Valley Windworks |image = [[File:Valley Windworks.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Valley Windworks. |tokens = 43,000 |location = East of Floaroma Town. }} The '''Valley Windworks''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 756,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=5|<center> N/A || [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow, [[File:Stunky.png|40px]] Stunky |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Stunky.png|40px]] Stunky |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Drifloon.png|40px]] '''Drifloon*''' ||<center>3,803,000 || [[File:Commander_(mars).png|40px]] Commander Mars || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Purugly.png|40px]] Purugly || <center>1,901,500 |- |} '''*Must have cleared Valley Windworks at least once to unlock Drifloon'''
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 1 || 24.99% || 24.05% || 22.62% || 20.21% |- | {{Bag2|Poké Ball}} || 1 || 24.99% || 24.05% || 22.62% || 20.21% |- | {{Bag2|Great Ball}} || 1 || 24.99% || 24.05% || 22.62% || 20.21% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || 1 || 20.01% || 21.04% || 22.60% || 25.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || 1 || 4.01% || 5.21% || 7.04% || 10.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.59% || 2.50% || 4.03% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Alola]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
